text: Nao Eliakimu, na Shebina, na Joa makĩĩra mũnene ũcio wa mbũtũ cia ita atĩrĩ, “Twagũthaitha arĩria ndungata ciaku na rũthiomi rwa Asuriata, tondũ nĩtũrũũĩ.36:11 Rũthiomi rwa Asuriata ruoĩkaine nĩ anene tu hĩndĩ ĩno; nĩ rwacookire gũtuĩka rwa kwario nĩ Ayahudi othe kuuma mwaka wa 5 mbere ya gũciarwo gwa Kristũ. Tiga gũtwarĩria na rũthiomi rwa Kĩhibirania andũ aya marĩ rũthingo-inĩ makĩiguaga.”
